description: This file sets up a knowledge base using PDF URL data, configures an agent with an Ollama model, and executes a query to generate a response about Thai curry.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with a language model and a knowledge base to generate responses.

classes.name: Ollama
classes.description: A class representing the Ollama language model.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for vector database operations using PostgreSQL and pgvector.

classes.name: OllamaEmbedder
classes.description: An embedder class for generating embeddings compatible with Ollama models.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the PDF knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response to a given prompt using the agent.
